resources.string:
Gestures are used to control the player. Tap the center of the screen to stop and restart the current audio. Swipes (where you drag your finger in a straight line on the screen, then lift the finger) are used for the remaining gestures: Swipe Up to go to the previous audio segment at the current depth in the book. Swipe Down to go to the next audio segment at the current depth in the book. Swipe from left to right to increase the depth. Swipe from right to left to decrease the depth.
DAISY books can contain material at a single depth, or at multiple depths e.g. to represent chapters (where the depth might be level 1) and sections (where the depth might be level 2).
